Method Detail

addPirateName

public void addPirateName(java.lang.String name)
Adds a new name to Piratename arraylist, also check if string already exists and if input is empty.

Parameters:
name - name first is the name.

load

public void load(java.lang.String fileName)
Load mechanics, reads in from file, arraylist size, and uses that as a run number for a loop. Read names in a loop, depending on number of times read.

NameGen

public java.lang.String NameGen()
The Name Generator for Name, uses random to generate 1 values, based on the arraylist. This value is then compered to the arraylist and a name is picked from it.

Returns:
n - n is the name generated by random and index comparison.

removeName

public void removeName(java.lang.String name)
Enables a user to delete a name from the Piratename arraylist. Searches thought the arraylist.

Parameters:
name - name is the name you want to have removed.

save

public void save(java.lang.String fileName)
Save mechanics for the name arraylist. Prints arraylist size, then name, then repeats this for all names.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
toString, prints the total count of possible pirate names pluss a list of names

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
temp the combination of text, arraylist size, names.
